courses.title: Introduction to Cost Estimation
courses.description: A foundational course covering the basics of cost estimation, including methodologies and best practices.

courses.title: Advanced Project Planning
courses.description: An in-depth course focusing on advanced techniques for project planning and scheduling.

courses.title: Space Program Risk Management
courses.description: Learn about identifying, analyzing, and mitigating risks in space program projects.

courses.title: Leadership in Cost Assurance
courses.description: A course designed for executives to understand their role in cost assurance and decision-making.
